collectible.title: Housepet Tag
collectible.subtitle: Are you a "Fido" or "Mittens"?
collectible.text: The bad news is you're now Yumeko's brand-new housepet... but depending on your point of view, that could also be the good news.
collectible.unlock: Lose a game where Yumeko is the winner. Don't try to cheese it, either.
